mark.tattoo: a tattoo or tattoos that are unique enough or extensive enough to set you apart.

mark.jewlery: a piece of jewlery that is unique or unusual such as a nose chain or rhino-head ring.

mark.scar: a scar or scars savage or extensive enough to be memorable.

mark.body paint: pigments applied to the body in great enough quantity to seem unusual.

mark.mannerism: any of a wide range of odd behavior such as howling at stray cats or chewing on leather belts.
